title: Constructivist-Based Web-Based Learning (WBL) Design Strategies: Intensive Short-Term Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic web tool proficiency and foundational knowledge of educational pedagogy
context.additional_context: A workshop-style, practice-oriented program enabling pre-service teachers to design web-based learning environments for science curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can design a WBL content structure based on constructivist theory with 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop three or more self-directed learning scenarios using hyperlinks and search functions.
Learners can plan two or more web-based interactive activities (e.g., discussions, collaborative projects) tailored to science curricula.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
